sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REALM the dominions of a king, a kingdom. The O.Fr. reaume (mod. royaume) was the form first adopted in English, and the modem spelling does not appear fixed till the beginning of the 17th century. The word must be referred to a supposed hied. Lat. regalimen, from regalis, of or belonging to a rex, king.
